item.title: At Glance
item.description: Pages linkExplore a wide range of content provided with a clean, readable, and enjoyable experience, all while minimizing cognitive load. Whether you’re here to explore our software solutions, access invaluable resources, or tap into a wide range of services, you can rest assured that we’ve poured our hearts ❤️ into creating an environment that caters to your needs. workspaces Service a service to develop, adapt, and manage technology you envision

item.title: General
item.description: Overview linkTechnology is no longer an expensive or inaccessible resource. Unfortunately, this accessibility primarily benefits individuals or companies already established in the field. Problem linkFor the majority of individuals or businesses, technology remains unfamiliar and out of reach. Yet, it’s undeniable that technology and automation play a crucial role in accelerating growth, enhancing efficiency, and ensuring survival. Solution linkWe aim to bridge this gap by offering technology-related services powered by cutting-edge solutions.

item.title: AISE
item.description: General linkAISE is a software built using the Godot Engine, offering users a suite of tools for image creation and modification. designed as a mobile application, its inception aimed to integrate cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology. Resources AI features Online features Offline features url type description Itch.io page, HTML5 executable & more user friendly explanation Android installer as apk target platform IOS N/A target platform Windows portable as exe in zip for testing, main development operating system MacOS unknown as zip for testing, untested / reported Linux portable as x86_64 in zip for testing, untested / reported Use Stable Diffusion Served by AI Horde Models Text to Image Image to Image ControlNet Tiling & More LoRA by Civit AI Style Prompt injection using CheatSheet Discovery (Social) Reporting Tool Version Checking Text Translation Google Translate API Image Optimization Resmush API image editing sketch gallery Motivation linkAISE was initially constructed within a limited timeframe, with a maximum duration of one day.

item.title: About us
item.description: NAIIVE is a decentralized organization operating across various fields. Initially, NAIIVE was established in response to the opportunities where numerous talented individuals were underappreciated, lacked connections, or had limited choices, hindering their ability to nurture and capitalize on their talents. One of the challenges for clients lies in the obscurity, difficulty in locating, lack of guarantees, or doubts associated with these talents, leading to missed opportunities and deals. NAIIVE serves as an intermediary and a guarantor, facilitating collaboration between clients and these talents, ensuring that they can fully leverage their skills, while clients receive assurances regarding the sustainability of their projects.
